SYN_3_7_5281:
[Indication]
Left mainstem obstruction (GPA).
[Anesthesia]
General.
[Description]
1. Flex bronch: Total LMS occlusion.
2. Rigid bronch: Attempted recanalization w/ knife, balloon, APC.
3. Complication: False lumen created, PA visualized. Procedure halted.
4. Intervention: Fibrin glue applied. Patient intubated.
5. Chest tube placed for pneumothorax.
[Plan]
ICU. CT Surgery consult. CT Chest.
